conbody.p: By default, you receive the following notification emails:

ul.li: Notifications on failed test runs that are uploaded to Katalon TestOps.
Weekly reports based on your testing activities.

conbody.p: Katalon TestOps sends notification emails to help you keep track of scheduled test executions. You can receive notification emails when test results are uploaded to Katalon TestOps. Each notification email can only report results of up to 5 test suites within a test run.

li.p: You have enabled TestOps integration in Katalon Studio. See: Katalon Studio Integration.
